record.description: University of Chicago Rhodes Scholarship winners. Yearly, thirty students from the United States receive the Cecil Rhodes Scholarship, and eligibility requires the highest standing as leaders and scholars, with an interest in athletics. Three who will represent the University of Chicago at Oxford next summer are pictured with Professor Robert Valentine Merrill. They are: John McDonough, Eugene Goodwillie and Bill Nash.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
